text: Mellersh is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Francis Mellersh (cricketer) (born 1786), English amateur cricketer *Francis Mellersh (RAF officer), KBE, AFC (1898–1955), Royal Naval Air Service aviator, flying ace, senior commander in the Royal Air Force *H. E. L. Mellersh (1897–1980), British author, primarily of text books ==See also== *Meller * *
title: Mellersh
